fields.name: AnalyticalStorageConfiguration
fields.description: Analytical storage specific properties.

fields.name: ApiProperties
fields.description: API specific properties.

fields.name: BackupPolicy
fields.description: The object representing the policy for taking backups on an account.

fields.name: Capabilities
fields.description: List of Cosmos DB capabilities for the account

fields.name: Capacity
fields.description: The object that represents all properties related to capacity enforcement on an account.

fields.name: ConnectorOffer
fields.description: The cassandra connector offer type for the Cosmos DB database C* account.

fields.name: ConsistencyPolicy
fields.description: The consistency policy for the Cosmos DB database account.

fields.name: Cors
fields.description: The CORS policy for the Cosmos DB database account.

fields.name: CreateMode
fields.description: Enum to indicate the mode of account creation.

fields.name: CustomerManagedKeyStatus
fields.description: Indicates the status of the Customer Managed Key feature on the account. In case there are errors, the property provides troubleshooting guidance.

fields.name: DatabaseAccountOfferType
fields.description: The offer type for the Cosmos DB database account. Default value: Standard.

fields.name: DefaultIdentity
fields.description: The default identity for accessing key vault used in features like customer managed keys. The default identity needs to be explicitly set by the users. It can be "FirstPartyIdentity", "SystemAssignedIdentity" and more.

fields.name: DisableKeyBasedMetadataWriteAccess
fields.description: Disable write operations on metadata resources (databases, containers, throughput) via account keys

fields.name: DisableLocalAuth
fields.description: Opt-out of local authentication and ensure only MSI and AAD can be used exclusively for authentication.

fields.name: DocumentEndpoint
fields.description: The connection endpoint for the Cosmos DB database account.

fields.name: EnableAnalyticalStorage
fields.description: Flag to indicate whether to enable storage analytics.

fields.name: EnableAutomaticFailover
fields.description: Enables automatic failover of the write region in the rare event that the region is unavailable due to an outage. Automatic failover will result in a new write region for the account and is chosen based on the failover priorities configured for the account.

fields.name: EnableBurstCapacity
fields.description: Flag to indicate enabling/disabling of Burst Capacity Preview feature on the account

fields.name: EnableCassandraConnector
fields.description: Enables the cassandra connector on the Cosmos DB C* account

fields.name: EnableFreeTier
fields.description: Flag to indicate whether Free Tier is enabled.

fields.name: EnableMultipleWriteLocations
fields.description: Enables the account to write in multiple locations

fields.name: EnablePartitionMerge
fields.description: Flag to indicate enabling/disabling of Partition Merge feature on the account

fields.name: FailoverPolicies
fields.description: An array that contains the regions ordered by their failover priorities.

fields.name: IPRules
fields.description: List of IpRules.

fields.name: InstanceId
fields.description: A unique identifier assigned to the database account

fields.name: IsVirtualNetworkFilterEnabled
fields.description: Flag to indicate whether to enable/disable Virtual Network ACL rules.

fields.name: KeyVaultKeyUri
fields.description: The URI of the key vault

fields.name: KeysMetadata
fields.description: The object that represents the metadata for the Account Keys of the Cosmos DB account.

fields.name: Locations
fields.description: An array that contains all of the locations enabled for the Cosmos DB account.

fields.name: MinimalTlsVersion
fields.description: Indicates the minimum allowed Tls version. The default value is Tls 1.2. Cassandra and Mongo APIs only work with Tls 1.2.

fields.name: NetworkAclBypass
fields.description: Indicates what services are allowed to bypass firewall checks.

fields.name: NetworkAclBypassResourceIds
fields.description: An array that contains the Resource Ids for Network Acl Bypass for the Cosmos DB account.

fields.name: PrivateEndpointConnections
fields.description: List of Private Endpoint Connections configured for the Cosmos DB account.

fields.name: PublicNetworkAccess
fields.description: Whether requests from Public Network are allowed

fields.name: ReadLocations
fields.description: An array that contains of the read locations enabled for the Cosmos DB account.

fields.name: RestoreParameters
fields.description: Parameters to indicate the information about the restore.

fields.name: VirtualNetworkRules
fields.description: List of Virtual Network ACL rules configured for the Cosmos DB account.

fields.name: WriteLocations
fields.description: An array that contains the write location for the Cosmos DB account.
